snippet: Forward Amar’e Stoudemire won’t play in Game 3 of the Knicks’ playoff series with the Heat, but he said he hoped to play in Game 4 on Sunday in New York.
abstract: New York Knicks forward Amar’e Stoudemire contends that his self-inflicted hand injury is a case of bad timing; he will not play in Game 3 of playoff series against the Miami Heat.
lead_paragraph: Forward Amar’e Stoudemire won’t play in Game 3 of the Knicks’ playoff series with the Heat, but he said he hoped to play in Game 4 on Sunday in New York.

headline.seo: Impassively, Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire Describes His Accident
